overview: "A friend whose name I have regrettably forgotten (Beth?) took pictures of her grandmother making faces.  I created a soundtrack looping her whispers and used a sound trigger video switching circuit to switch to the soundtrack. By switching 4 cameras and zooming in on the photos I created this video in real time. Creation date was around 1977. I played this in public schools during Artist in Residencies and scared too many kids." -ET
title: Make A Face Grandma
